Then after ICE raided my house and tried to deport me, I tried to delete the app and the cops came to the ICE building and started beating everyone in sight after president ordered it. 0/10 would not recommend: bunker boy needs to get betterğŸ¤¡ğŸ¤¡

attributes.title: absolute waste of time
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to find out more information about Trumpâ€™s 2020 campaign, but unfortunately, this app turned out to be complete trash. It took forever to load, and when it did, there were few factual points about Trump and his administration! I strongly encourage those thinking about giving time out of your day to this underdeveloped garbage to reconsider!

attributes.title: Bleach my eyes
attributes.review: I am scarred for life. I saw this app and downloaded just to check it out and when I opened it immediately showed me the most horrible figure. There was a guy with horrible features and he looked so orange.I started to scream and dropped my phone and my kid saw what was on my phone and got a heart attack and we had to take him to the hospital.I would never ever recommend downloading this app. Ruined my life.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I installed this app with very high expectations, as I was told in the terms and conditions that upon installation I would get to marry and meet Madelyn Cline. As the first 24 hours passed, I still had no Madelyn Cline. My anger and frustration grew more and more as I patiently waited for her. Eventually, I see Madelyn Cline appear on my front lawn. She came up to my front door, walked in and murdered me and my entire family. Yes, I am dead. No, you should not download this app.

attributes.title: Have to have a number
attributes.review: Right when I got on the app, first thing it says Is I have to have a number, and I donâ€™t have service right now, and Iâ€™m running on wifi, so I wait a few days till I got service and Itâ€™s working now, but It keeps crashing and taking me back to home page, and I waited so long just to not even get to use the app, very bad, and donâ€™t recommend this app.

attributes.title: The Worst App Ever!
attributes.review: Ok so, when I went into the app, it has horrible! All of a sudden we turned into happy birthday balloons! It took a week to become normal again. My food turned into oranges, too! Soup to orange! Water to orange! Anything that is edible is now oranges in my household! My fork has parrot feathers sticked on to it! And my guess who board game has gone wrong since I got the app! This app is dangerous!!! Do not DARE to download, itâ€™s not worth the week of waiting!
